all_questions.question: What type of space do embeddings represent?
all_questions.context: the representation level of the embeddings

all_questions.question: How can you relate the embedding of a word to the age of another word?
all_questions.context: if you take the embedding of the word king and subtract the embedding of the word man and add the embedding of the word woman, you will get to the age of the king

all_questions.question: What is another relation observed in the highly dimensional space?
all_questions.context: Another relation that was observed there was that verbs and their different tenses such as past tense are also in some like particle direction.

all_questions.question: Can you explain why a relationship exists between country names and capital names?
all_questions.context: And you can also see a similar relation to between country names and capital names.
